title: Xi Tang Lin
text:
Welcome to my website!
It’s a place for me to learn Quatro and showcase my learning.
Please take a look around.

title: Xi Tang Lin
text:
September 6. 2025

Created website with Index, About, and CV pages.
Uploaded Website to github.

title: Assignment1
text:
This website was created with RStudio Quarto.
The Minty theme was used to create a professional look. The navigation bar includes 5 links for connecting to different areas of my content.

title: About
text:
Hi, my name is Tan!
I’m an international student from Canada working towards my Master’s of Science in Statistics and Data Science at the University of Texas at Dallas.
You can often find me rock climbing, playing badminton, learning to dance, or reading a book.
One thing that changed my life was joining Toastmasters, a public speaking club.
After graduating, I plan on launching a career as a data scientist.

title: CV
text:
Accounting Coordinator | Apr 2024 - Aug 2025
Metro Ontario - Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Investigated and identified an issue with unorganized physical invoices, resulting in difficulty locating files and potential fire hazards. Informed supervisors and rolled out a new system to increase efficiency for a team of 20+ employees and ensure compliance with fire safety regulations.
Developed automations to increase work efficiency, saving multiple hours on weekly tasks.

title: CV
section: Math Program Coordinator & Instructor | Oct 2020 - Oct 2022
text:
Math Program Coordinator & Instructor | Oct 2020 - Oct 2022
Explorer Robotics Club - Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Simplified and explained mathematical concepts to students through engaging activities. Recognized for inspiring student enthusiasm and improving assessment performance by 20% over 2 years.

title: CV
text:
Area Director | Oct 2023 - Jun 2024
District 60 Toastmasters - Toronto, Ontario, Canada - Supported five clubs’ leadership teams by connecting them to district resources, organizing joint events, and collaborating to solve problems, helping them serve 100+ members.
Educational Program Manager | Jan 2022 - Dec 2024 University of Toronto Toastmasters - Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Facilitated public speaking workshops for various student and volunteer organizations by eliciting stakeholder needs, coordinating with presenters, and performing other ad-hoc tasks, resulting in over a dozen presentations impacting several hundred attendees.
